text: Anderson Bruford Wakeman Howe is an English progressive rock band formed in 1988. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Anderson Bruford Wakeman Howe (1989) ==References== Category:Musical groups established in 1988 Category:1988 establishments in England Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1990 Category:1990 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:1990s disestablishments in England
